channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: ‘KEEP CLEAR’ sign in turning area need’s repainting, 3rd January
item.description:
The words KEEP CLEAR in the turning area of the cul de sac outside no. 15 Ruxley Close needs repainting as drivers who can read park here causing issues for vehicles trying to to turn around.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ruxley Close, North Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned and untaxed vehicle, 3rd January
item.description:
This vehicle has been dumped here for months. It is untaxed, has no MOT and also parked partially up on the pavement outside of number 12 and 10 Thicket Road. Yellow citron with an L learner plate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Thicket Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass on Cumberland Close outside Church, 3rd January
item.description:
Someone broke a car window and now there is glass on the road. Please clean this up. Also, I would like CCTV footage of this area from 02/01/26 at 23:45 to 03/01/36 at 14:15. If you can't provide the footage, please send it to the police.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Carlisle Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Vehicle that is untaxed, 3rd January
item.description:
This vehicle has been abandoned on the street and is untaxed and has no valid MOT.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Thicket Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London

item.title: Bin has not been collected - littering the street, 3rd January
item.description:
The blue bin outside 29 Dagmar road has not been collected for weeks. It is full up to the brim. The bin has no lid and the wind/foxes are spreading the litter across the street. Please could this be collected as is making the area look unsightly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Dagmar Road, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeated dog fouling, 3rd January
item.description:
Dog fouling is a repeated problem on the pavement between the William Camden pub and the station car park. There is so much it's hard to avoid without walking in the road. Please can pavement stencils and signs be installed as a deterrent
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodlands Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary road sign and sand bag left behind after roadworks, 3rd January
item.description:
There is a Road Closed sign and sand bag left behind on Palmeira Rd following the recent roadworks non Brampton Rd. Please can this be collected? It is tucked behind the green electrical box at the entrance to. Palmeira Rd.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Palmeira Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole next to kerb on Upton Round, 3rd January
item.description:
When travelling on Upton Road towards Townley Road there is a large hole forming where the road surface is collapsing. This is damaging to care which drive over it. It is on the left hand side just past the mini roundabout at the junction with Mount Rd.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upton Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pathway in park cracked and dropped causing trip hazard, 3rd January
item.description:
The pathway along the park near to the cafe has dropped and cracked over a large area causing a dangerous trip hazard. My daughter tripped on it today causing her to hurt her ankle. In addition to this area there are several other sections of the pathways in the park, mainly on the middle section path, that have deteriorated and are on different levels that need repairing or replacing as they have the potential for a serious trip hazards on the hill.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parkside Gardens, Brunswick Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car For Sale Over Since Oct 2025, 3rd January
item.description:
There is a white Ford Fiesta that has been for sale near the entrance of the Pavillion Club for over a month. It has been in a collision with it's drivers side mirror smashed off. The person who is selling this car constantly dumps cars "for sale" along this stretch making parking difficult for residents. This car has been parked up for sale since Oct 2025.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Footscray Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet
